name: Atharva Kulkarni
title: President
description: Atharva is an aspiring data scientist looking to use his experience for the broader social good. He has worked on finding keystone gut microbiota that can mitigate refractory epilepsy and a semi-supervised model that can detect illegal activity in graph social networks. But he knows not everything good in life has to start with pd.read_csv() -  he enjoys cooking, exploring the outdoors, and reading books related to history, philosophy, and the sciences.

name: Shivangi Gupta
title: Online Content Director
description: Shivangi is an economics and data science student who is hopeful about working as a data scientist upon graduation. She's interned at SDG&E, where she built a ML model to optimize customers' journeys when interacting with the online self-service portal, MyAccount. In her free time, she loves to read romance and thriller novels, watch reality TV shows, and play chess!

name: Luran Zhang
title: Professional Events Co-Director
description: Hello, this is Luran (Lauren)ðŸ˜„. I am a third year student from Muir college double major in Data Science and Joint Math Econ. During my free time, I enjoy solving puzzles, watching movies, snowboarding, and rock climbing (just picked it up this summer).

name: Advaith Ravishankar
title: Projects Director
description: I am a third-year undergraduate at UC San Diego who specializes in Computer Vision and Data Science. I have over 2 years of research experience applying computer vision models in computational neuroscience, making it easier to annotate 2D poses in video data. I am currently interested in generative AI by combining both NLP and computer vision to automatically generate videos based on text prompts.

name: Trey Scheid
title: Professional Events Director, HDSI Liaison
description: Trey is a Data Science major with an interest in recommender systems and machine learning methods. He has gained valuable experience in roles ranging from a student startup to the manufacturing industry where he created classification models and evaluated production using Operational Equipment Effectiveness. In addition to his academic pursuits, he enjoys photography and fringe "sports".

name: Jonathan Lo
title: Infrastructure Director
description: Jonathan is a data science student at UC San Diego. He is a software engineer intern at San Diego Supercomputer Center, where he works on data-enabled scientific computing. He has also been a webmaster of the Data Science Student Society at UCSD and a data quality intern at Fluidra North America.
